Urho3D::AttributeAnimationInfo Class Reference

Attribute animation instance, it include animation runtime information, when animation playing it will update the object's attribute value automatically. More...

#include <Animatable.h>

Detailed Description

Attribute animation instance, it include animation runtime information, when animation playing it will update the object's attribute value automatically.
